content: this simple square neck tank will be your go-to warm weather top the unique neckline construction adds interest to an otherwise simple top designed to be slightly cropped but easily customizable to any length quick to make this pattern is perfect for beginners and seasoned knitters alike this top is constructed from the top down first you will shape the neckline and straps then you will separate to increase more at the front and back body panels finally you will join the body panels to work the body of the top in the round a free version of this pattern can be viewed on my blog 2 this tank top is designed in 9 sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x finished bust/chest circumference 28 32 36 40 44 48 52 56 60 finished width 14 16 18 20 22 24 26 28 30 armhole depth 7 8 9 9 10 10 11 11 14 finished length 19 20 20 20 5 20 5 21 21 21 5 21 5 this sweater is designed to be worn with 0-4 of negative ease model is 6 tall has a 33 bust and is wearing a size small with 1 of negative ease for best fit choose a size that is closest to 0-4 smaller than your corresponding bust measurement for example if your bust is 50 you would wear a size 2x if you prefer your garments to fit looser or more snug choose a size with less or more ease accordingly materials 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 skeins / approx 275 325 350 390 425 475 500 550 550 yards lion brand comfy cotton blend shown in
